The survivors are well made, the killers differ quite a lot, all together it's a pretty well rounded game.

There are siome bugs and glitches, some are more anoying than others, but if the development can fix that, this will be a classic :)

Sinceramente después de 150 horas no recomiendo en absoluto este juego.

Un juego totalmente desequilibrado donde el matchmaking te junta con rangos muy superiores al tuyo y donde las partidas entre supervivientes y asesino son un completo desequilibrio.

El juego basicamente consiste en premades de supervivientes vacilando al asesino.

A Behavior esto no solo no le preocupa sino que lo fomenta parche tras parche haciendo que el desequilibrio sea cada vez mayor. Una compañía solo preocupada de vender skins.

GOOOODD YEEESSSSSS!!! Intense, challenging, fun, you're gonna have a heart attack in the first few games, also a stroke, from not being able to repair generators, like you wish you could.  There's a sound, before skillcheck. Just leaving that here. BUT the game is amazing, I played 11 hours straight on the free weekend and to make sure I really did want the game and to make a good decision I waited till the winter sales. I had withdrawal syndromes, so you know it's good. ITS GOOD!
BUT!!! And this is a big but ;), also be prepared to play an extension of the game called Dead By Buglight! :)

esse jogo e mt bom comprem

Dead by Daylight

WARNING: Spoilers may be ahead (You have been warned)

A game where death is not an escape...

A game where you can either attempt to survive with three others, so you can repair five generators to escape. Or, you can be a killer. There are around six killers to choose from; Trapper, Wraith, Hillbilly, The Nurse, Michael Myers (DLC) and The hag (DLC)

All of the killers have different weapons that you can use. Such as with the Hillbilly, you can charge up your chainsaw and sprint towards a survivor, wounding them with your chainsaw. As you play the killer, the way you need to get rid of the survivors is to hang them on meat hooks and sacrafice them so you can win the game.

There are many maps (locations, as they call it) to play in the game. The maps are:

*The Macmillan Estate
   *Coal Tower
   *Ironworks of Misery
   *Shelter Woods
   *Suffocation Pit

*Coldwind Farm
   *Thompson House
   *Rancid Abattoir
   *Rotten Fields
   *Torment Creek
   *Fractured Cowshed

*Autohaven Wreckers
   *Azarov's Resting Place
   *Blood Lodge
   *Wreckers' Yard
   *Wretched Shop

*Crotus Prenn Asylum
   *Disturbed Ward

*Haddonfield
   *Lampkin Lane

*Backwater Swamp
   *The Pale Rose

I am not sure if all of these maps/locations are in the game, but they maybe part of the lore. 

There is also a skill tree in Dead by Daylight, best known as 'The Bloodweb'. 'The Bloodweb' is where you can unlock nodes and when you unlock those nodes, you can unlock items, get more perks, add-ons and more content. To unlock these nodes, you need Bloodpoints.

Summary of the Bloodweb:

*There is one bloodweb for each character.

*The Bloodweb is procedurally generated.

*Player spends Bloodpoints to progress through the Bloodweb.

*If the Bloodweb is filled entirely, anoither Bloodweb will be created.

*The higher the level the more of a chance to get rare items.

*The player can unlock permanent perks in the Bloodweb.

*The player can collect add-ons, perks and objects on the Bloodweb.

*The player can collect permanent buffs from the Bloodweb.

*The player can unlock permanent loudout slots from the Bloodweb.

Now for the gameplay.

If you play as a survivor, you will be in a third-person perspective, whereas if you are the killer, you will be in the first-person perspective. This is so you can see whats around you as you are repairing a generator. If it was first person, it wouldn't really be fair as you cannot see if the killer is near you. Also, there is a heart beat sound to tell you if the killer is near you. If the heart beat is slow/moderate, the killer isn't really close, but if the heart beat is fast, the killer could be real close to you. So I recommend to pay attention to what sounds are playing so you can tell if its a heart beat or not.

If you get caught by the killer, as the killer is carrying you, you can button-mash A + D to get out of his hold and run. Same goes for when you get hung. Just as you get hung you can hold down the left mouse button to try and get off the hook yourself, without anyone else's help. But there is only a small chance of getting off of it without noone else's help.

If you are about to be sacraficed, you will need to smash the spacebar and just hope someone is going to come and help you off that hook before you get sacraficed. I don't know if by smashing spacebar can get you off the hook.

If you are playing as a survivor, you will need to get all of the generators repaired so you can get to one of two escape gates and open them. 

Now for the soundtrack/music.

The soundtrack of the game is just great, I have been listening to the theme over and over again, because I really like the combination of the menu theme, survivor theme and the killer theme. The thing about these themes, is that all of them sound the same, but a different instrument is used on each of them, with a twist. My favourite theme out of all of them is the killer theme. I recommend listening to it yourself as I don't really want to spoil it for you.

We are getting close to the end of this review, but just one thing;

This game has terrible optimization. If your PC is really good, don't expect to get 60 FPS on ultra settings. I recommend looking up a tutorial on YouTube for how to lower lag on Dead by Daylight. But then again, the developer team was made up of ten people. I think they did a pretty good job of making this game.

I really enjoyed playing this game, I would play it over and over again, but the optimization was just terrible. If they fixed the optimization of this game i will make my score 8.5/10. But for now my score will be 8/10.

As it is a 8/10 i recommend this game.

EDIT: Its great to see more chapters getting added - more survivors and killers to play as, also the game is now playable on XBONE and PS4. Again, good job Behaviour Interactive

Es un juego que tiene la capacidad de mantenerte alerta todo el tiempo jugando de sus dos posibles maneras: Sobreviviente o asesino

Como sobreviviente podras estar en distintos mapas en los cuales tienes como objetivo arreglar motores para posteriormente escapar, pero cuidado, en ese lapso de tiempo tienes al asesino buscandote para asesinarte despiadadamente

Como asesino tu unico objetivo es asesinar a sangre fria a tus presas (sobrevivientes) para poder hacerlo tienes que golpear dos veces a cada personaje para poderlos colgar en alguno de todos los ganchos que aparecen aleatoriamente en los distintos mapas de juego

So I first started playing this game when it first launched, and although there were a few balancing issues, it was very enjoyable, I won some, I lost some... I mostly played killer. I got distracted, and didn't play this for 7-8months... I came back and find that all my BP (Progression points) have been wiped. The balancing is worse than ever... I'm not very far in the game and have very few perks, and the survivors can get away WAY too easily. The community has learned to exploit the game: Loop-dee-loop around structures, camping at pallets, meanwhile they can run as fast as the killer, sabotage hooks, the trapper traps use to take a while to escape from,  but now they can escape just about as fast as they get caught depending on tools/abilities, and the matchmaking keeps putting low level players gainst high one... The devs solution? they don't seem to show the player levels before beginning a match. I used to really like that game despite it's flaws, but the balance is way too tipped in the favor of survivors right now... makes half of the game unenjoyable. The community is toxic too, they expect you to catch and hung up survivors, but they whine if you dare camp the hook (or not, you'll be called a camper whatever you do) meanwhile you just need to step away slightly, and the survivors can rescue their friends in a matter of what? 2 seconds?... Also,tThis game reminds me of DUST514 for the PS3 by CCP games...The devs are led by the nose by this stupid toxic community and keep trying to "balance the game" to try to please the community, but since they can't please everyone they just make it worse and eventually the game will die. Forget this game, Friday the 13th is coming out soon.

This forces you to restart the whole game just to start a new queue again.
Another turn down for this game is the server, though if theres' enough amount of player I  personally believe dev team will start their dedicated server for this game.

Long live the king...Jason Voorhees.

This game istmosphereic and enjoyable but brutally one-sided. This is a great game to play with your friends but the non-killer characters are very too helpless. I know its supposed to be a horror-movie-esque set up but as far as game mechanics go it could use tweaking for the sake of balanced gameplay.

Game designers, if you can read this, hear me out. How about you make it so the hooks never kill you and just hang there...then someone can save you any time they want. Or maybe allow your player to pull themselves up withotu the aid of another player (that is insanely frsutrating). Or give the players more health.

Left 4 Dead is another multiple player horror game where you can play as the monster and it had far more balance. I'm just saying this game could use effective gameplay mechanics.

But it still is a lot fun. I can't see myself playing it for hours and hours but I had a blast playing it with my buddies. Worth the on-sale price, but I wouldn't have bought ti for full price.

Pero a decir verdad, es un juego que es mucho mejor en compañía de un amigo.

Dead by DayLight Oyun İncelemesi 
Oyun bir Korku Aksiyon Gerilim türünde oyun.
Oyunda 4 kişi Jenaratörlerin 5 tanesini çalıştırıp katilin ininden yani mekanından kaçmaya çalışıyor Katilin Tuhaf Tuhaf özellikleri var Görünmez olabiliyor Bir tanesi Testeresi ile koşabiliyor Biraz Fantastik türünde olmuş o özellikler Oyunu İlk aldığımda Biraz Kastı Sistem isteyen bir oyun 5 arkadaş girip oyuna Çok eğlenebilirsiniz Özellikle Kaçan Kişiler için Gerilim ve Heyecan çok yüksek oluyor Jenaratörleri düzeltirken Bozabiliyorsunuz Ve bu ses çıkartıyor Bu yüzden katil bir an gözünüzün önünde belirebiliyor ayrıca Düzeltirken Çalıştırıcağınız için gene Ses çıkartıyor Katil yakında ise gene durum vahim.
5 tane jenaratörü yapamadıysanız tek kaldıysanız Kaçmanız için bir Kapak var Bayağı güzel bir özellik olmuş.Katil Arkadaşlarınızı bir Yere asıyor ve öldürüyor Tuhaf bir biçimde Onu kurtarabiliyorsunuz fakat Katil sizi yanlız bırakmaz bu yüzden riskli oluyor Tuzak koyabiliyorsunuz Tuzaklara fener falan alabiliyorsunuz Özellikleri oluyor karakterlerinde.
Oyun eğlenceli biraz gerilim türü oyun Fazla korku yok Heyecanda var dediğim gibi alabilirsiniz hoş bir oyun olmuş gerçekten İlk aldığım gün Korkudan hiç bir şey yapmayıp saklanmıştım :) Artık alıştığım için çok korkmuyorum alın derim bir deneyin Arkadaşlarınız ile eğlenebilirsiniz oyunda da arkadaş bulabilirsiniz tabi Alın bir deneyin :D

As much as I love this game and enjoy playing it I find 2 major issues when playing it:
1) Randomised spawning is great, until you end up spawning 10ft from the killer. It's not fun when the killer can SEE YOU when you spawn. You get a piss poor score, and no currency to spend on levelling up. Since there is ALWAYS a basement somewhere on the map with 4 hooks and a chest, surely the killer should always spawn there, so the killer can't see the survivers at the moment of spawn?
2) Matchmaking can have you with a level 1 surviver, no perks or very very basic perks against a killer with a full load out of pink/purple [top tiers] perks. Again... why bother trying at this point. Surely you should be matched with killers and survivers that match your level with the character you're playing so the experience is fair?
Other than that this is a really really fun game, but most of the fun is had with friends in a 5 man, because of the above reasons online can sometimes leave you feeling a bit... let down by the unbalanced nature of things.

Dead by Daylight is a refreshing game with cool ideas, but the bugs are very annoying.

- the endless loading screen (no matter if I play as survivor, killer or only trying to get in a lobby)
- not being able to see my character (in most cases I cannot even escape)

I am really having a lot of fun, this game is great and the bugs wouldn't be so bad but it happens so often. On bad days I restart the every three to four rounds which is sad. I also read that these bugs are very common and not since only a few weeks - they do exist for a long amount of time now.

Another point which I can't really understand are those many DLCs. Yea, if I do not want them I do not have to purchase them, but the game isn't even finished yet and still has so many issues. Why don't work on that first?

Please fix your game devs - this game makes so much fun and it would be a shame if I would stop playing it because of the issues.

В начале игры киллер можно выйти и все выжившие полyчают понижение ранга. Это вообще бред...

The idea behind this game is nice but the implementation is outright awful. This game is buggy and glitchy at times. Some of them are amusing, others are game breaking. The last straw for me was a bug that corrupted my save state, sending all my items and skills into the nirvana. Contacted the support without success. it also runs very poorly on decent hardware.

I've had this game since the release, every single time i play this game i have to force close because it freezes after a few matches. Matchmaking lobbies are a joke. As soon as you get a game started 1 survivor is always ALWAYS lagged out. Waiting on bugs and minor fixes is a waste of time, and when they announced they did *FIX* bugs, the problems still persisted.

Bug 太多
I reviewed this game before and rated it pporly. since then DBD came a long way and I really enjoy the suspense  for both killer and survivor!

Nur traurig, dass dieses Spiel nicht mal ein richtiges Matchmaking hat und alle Spieler einfach, egal welches Level sie haben, zusammenschmeißt. Teilweise klappt die Matchsuche manchmal überhaupt nicht, wenn man mit zwei oder mehr Freunden zusammenspielen will. Da verbringt man dann schon 20 min nur in der Lobby. Aber trotzdessen erstmal einfach neue Killer rausbringen und dafür Kohle verlangen.. 

Das Konzept von dem Spiel ist aber richtig super leider nutzen die Entwickler das ganz schön aus. Zum Beispiel Kohle für zusätzlichen Inhalt, obwohl das Spiel selbst schon nicht viel ausmacht. Plus, dass noch eine Menge anderer unfertiger Punkte hinzu kommt (wie es aussieht kümmern die Leute sich darum erstmal nicht).

Its very good to download kept my eye on this game for awhile so i can get it who knows i might get it today the only down side is that it takes a bit to load and y friends i have no time for that type of stuff
Dead by Daylight is a well balanced and fair game.
Efsane :)
Good game
